login.question: how to log in
login.answer: To log in to the system, use the API: {Domain}/System/API/Authorization.php?F=LOGIN. Method: POST. Fields: Email and Password. A successful response contains a session key.

get_account.question: how to get account data
get_account.answer: Use the API: {Domain}/System/API/Connect.php. Header: 'S-KEY': {Session key}. Method: GET. The response contains your profile data.

add_post.question: how to submit a post
add_post.answer: Use the API: {Domain}/System/API/AddPost.php. Method: POST. Fields: Text, File (optional), ClearMetadataIMG (true/false), CensoringIMG (true/false). Header: 'S-KEY': {Session key}.

api_info: Set the User-Agent to 'InteriumAPI'. For some scripts, use 'FormData' to send the data.
